pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: mutusi thithu qalhufu smapuk sa ranaw.
She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: apura’in, itiza iamin munai.
Grandfather, we’re here.

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: uka maniun a apura’in itaun, isai buhat thithu, itaun maniun mitalha thithu.
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他吧。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: ama Tuba itiza ihu munai!
Uncle Tuba, you’re here!

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: mathuaw mataliza antu mriqaz ihun, minmarutawiza ihu.
I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: mathuaw maqaran naak a shnaw ya mriqaz ihun.
It’s so good to see you.

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: haya wa ung-lai pansha maniun, apisai matithi a kakadu.
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: mindaaqiza antu shinai, amalalawa iaku thaithuy pashtay mulhthkiz munai makaan.
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: ingqaiza uka shawashawan, uqay iaku miqilha pushawil, usui ita maharan a bukhaz malhalhinuna.
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: anuniza! ingqaiza uka shawashawan, amutaun iaku.
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: kinapathay iaku haya ranaw, kathuiza ihu manataun makaan.
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: qazii ya simaq a saqazi mapariqaz ita?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: ua, a’intua ita amapariqaz?
Sure, where should we meet?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: isui ita lhupilhupishan a taun mitalha? apashtiruq iamin.
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: usui ita talhuqan mitalha maqitan, a’ifazin Thau a hulus iaku mutantu.
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: mathuaw lamaqitan iamin a sa-ku-laa ya makabukay. ya makabukay unai ihu makilhim iakin.
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: ashaunatusiza puhubuqiza wa qali, mathuaw mindaaq!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: qazii ya Tungkariri Lus’an ihu munai!
Then come during our Tungkariri Lus’an!
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 那你祖靈祭的時候來吧!

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: ua! miku’utantu iaku!
Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: minu ihu qa amushuqish kataunan?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: maqa amutaun iaku fuifuilh patashan.
I want to return to teach at the local school.

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: minu ihu qa antu itusi mawalhnaq a pruq fuifuilh patashan?
Why not teach in the city?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: maqa mangqtu iaku naak a kataunan a pruq, numa miku iaku lhungqizi kataunan a thau.
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: mathuaw ma’ania ihu tunuun, tima fuilh ihun?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: naak a apuki’ay, lamathuaw thithu ma’ania tunuun maqusum a tanatuqash isa naam a kataunan.
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: minu ihu qa amangqtu minfazaq tunuun sa maqusum?
How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: maqa tunuun sa maqusum mita wa kazakazash, mangqtu iaku izai a kazakazash ata pu’ukai.
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: haya sunda wa qilha mathuaw maqitan ya qilhan.
This millet wine is delicious.

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: iaku min’ananak pinqilha!
I made it myself!

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: mathuaw ma’ania ihu, amindaaq ya kmalawa haya qilha?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: antu mindaaq, tata wa ripay painan aminqilhaiza. pintatan sunda wa zashuq masa kamar, numa pahiburan sa bulbul, numa ribuqin pisai qatapay, numa pusai sa tahamish.
No, it only takes about a week. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 不用，大約一周就好了。把糯米和小米先蒸熟，再加入麴粉一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: numa s ihu farifariwin aniamin?
What do you sell?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: itia haya makamun numa tilkun, iaku min’ananak malhuiza!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: lakuza wa tuali haya latusha afariwik?
How much for both?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: mulhthkiz lhupishin tusha shaba ianan larima makthin a sui.
250 dollars in total.

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: mushnaw iaku haya hulus, lapiza wa tuali?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: haya latata larima shaba wa sui.
It’s 500 dollars.

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: mathuaw maklis, qazii ya put’ladadu?
It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: ata, ya ladadu pungqalath iaku sa tuali.
No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: shduu! afariw iaku latata maqusuqusum a hulus.
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: afariw iaku haya funush numa qashay.
I want this knife and this pot.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: mulhthkiz lhupishin latusha matilatilaw a sui, haya funush numa qashay min’ananak iaku kmalawa, amathuaw mindaaq maqitan kinalawa.
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: amalalawa iaku naak a huruy munai fariw, put’ladaduan dai?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: shduu! put’ladaduan ladadu.
Alright! I’ll give you a discount.

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: izau unai mariqazuan! farifariw hulus numa tamuhun!
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: lapiza wa tuali haya wa hulus?
How much for the clothes?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: haya latata hulus turu shaba ianan marimaz a sui, numa ya laturu shduuiza tata matilatilaw a sui.
One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: amuqay iaku fariw latata, anai faqlhu a hulus
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: maqitan ihu, afariw iaku sunda wa afu numa qana.
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和刺蔥芋莖腸。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: mulhthkizin fariwiniza s afu ukaiza. itia tatanaq a qmu, afariw ihu?
The rice is sold out. I have tana mochi, would you like to buy them?
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥麻糬，你要買嗎?

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: ua! fariw iaku tata, amuqthaiza iaku munai fariw afu.
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。

pashtay maqitan piakalingkin piakaimahan: ua, apasain qahil iaku putiqu lhai ihun, haya marimaz a sui.
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
大家好，大家平安。我們開始了。: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
